Mensesneg: Presiden akan Selalu Evaluasi Jajaran Pembantunya
04 Nov 2019, 16:28 by Rini Hairani


Mensesneg: Presiden akan Selalu Evaluasi Jajaran Pembantunya

KBRN,  Jakarta : Presiden Joko Widodo akan melakukan evaluasi setiap saat guna memantau kinerja kementerian dan lembaga negara di Kabinet Indonesia Maju (KIM).Tidak hanya di jajaran menteri,  Menteri Sekretaris Pratikno menjamin bahwa evaluasi atas pelaksanaan tugas mereka akan selalu dilakukan juga wakil menteri.Khususnya berkaitan dengan efektivitas dari tugas-tugas seorang wamen dalam membantu sang menteri"Ya setiap saat lah. Tapi Presiden selalu memberi penugasan juga pada wamen," kata kata Pratikno di gedung Krida Bhakti, Jl Veteran III, Jakarta Pusat, Senin (04/11/2019). Diketahui, dalam Perpres 72 tahun 2019, seorang wamen diangkat dan diberhentikan oleh Presiden Jokowi dan bertanggungjawab.Wamen nantinya akan memiliki beberapa tugas antara lain membantu Menteri dalam perumusan dan/atau pelaksanaan kebijakan Kementerian.Kedua, membantu Menteri dalam mengkoordinasikan pencapaian kebijakan strategis lintas unit organisasi Jabatan Pimpinan Tinggi Madya atau eselon I atau di lingkungan Kementerian.Sebelumnya, dalam kabinet Jokowi-Ma'ruf, ada 12 wamen yang sudah dilantik yaitu Wamen BUMN, Wamen Pertahanan, Wamen Agama, Wamen Pariwisata dan Ekraf, Wamen Agraria dan Tata Ruang,Wamen PUPR, Wamen BUMN, Wamenlu,Wamen Lingkungan Hidup dan Kehutanan,Wamendes PDTT, Wamendag hingga Wamenkeu.

Minister of State Secretary: The President will Always Evaluate the Assistant Levels
Nov 04 2019, 16:28 by Rini Hairani


Minister of State Secretary: The President will Always Evaluate the Assistant Levels

KBRN, Jakarta: President Joko Widodo will conduct an evaluation at any time to monitor the performance of ministries and state institutions in the Advanced Indonesia Cabinet (KIM). Not only in the ranks of ministers, Minister Secretary Pratikno guarantees that evaluations of the implementation of their duties will always be carried out by deputy ministers. Particularly related to the effectiveness of the duties of a wamen in helping the minister "Yes at any time. But the President always assigns assignments to the wamen too," Pratikno said in the Krida Bhakti building, Jl Veteran III, Central Jakarta, Monday (11/04) / 2019). It is known, in Perpres 72 of 2019, a Deputy Minister is appointed and dismissed by President Jokowi and is responsible. The Minister will later have several tasks including assisting the Minister in formulating and / or implementing Ministry policies. Secondly, assisting the Minister in coordinating the achievement of strategic policies across organizational units Middle Senior Leadership Positions or Echelon I or within the Ministry. Previously, in the Jokowi-Ma'ruf cabinet, there were 12 wamen who had been appointed namely BUMN Wamen, Defense Wamen, Religious Wamen, Religious and Tourism Wamen, Agrarian and Spatial Wamen, Wamen PUPR, Vice Minister of BUMN, Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs, Vice Minister of Environment and Forestry, Vice Minister of PDTT, Vice Minister of Trade to Deputy Minister of Finance.
